name: stopwatch-webapp
description: PWA for stage magicians to control spectator stopwatch via API with SQL database backend

scripts.db:backup: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const now=new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g,'-'); const src='database/stopwatch_magic.db'; const dest=`database/backup/${now}_stopwatch_magic.db`; if(fs.existsSync(src)) { fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dest), {recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('Database backed up to:', dest); } else { console.log('No database file found to backup'); }"

author: Your Name
